meanings.definition: Software that is unnecessarily large or filled with unnecessary features, causing it to run slowly or take up excessive space on a device.
meanings.sent1: The bloatware on my computer made it so slow.
meanings.sent2: I had to delete the bloatware to free up space on my phone.
meanings.sent3: The bloatware on my tablet was like having a backpack full of rocks.
meanings.sent4: The bloatware weighed down my laptop like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: Removing the bloatware felt like shedding a heavy burden.

meanings.definition: To install unnecessary or excessive software on a device, causing it to run slowly or take up excessive space.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally bloatwared my new computer with unnecessary programs.
meanings.sent2: Make sure not to bloatware your phone with apps you don't need.
meanings.sent3: He bloatwared his laptop with so many games, it almost crashed.
meanings.sent4: Her computer was bloatwared to the point of being unusable.
meanings.sent5: Bloatwaring your device is like filling a suitcase with rocks before a trip.
